roleset.name: lope
roleset.note: LOPE-V NOTES: hand-checked by Kevin (from lope.01-v)

example.name: lope-v: from Google
example.text: Police and Border Patrol trucks and news helicopters followed as they loped down suburban streets in the Eastlake area of Chula Vista.
example.arg: in the Eastlake area of Chula Vista

example.name: lope-v
example.text: Wolves loped from dens to see what poor, miserable creature was caught in the evening forest.
example.arg: to see what poor, miserable creature was caught in the evening forest
